name: Intelligent Virtual Product Assistant for Global Healthcare
description: Transformed customer support with a multilingual Gen AI-powered chatbot that processes natural language queries, provides contextual answers from knowledge bases, and delivers video responses from relevant timestamps.
challenge: Existing chatbot failed to answer unstructured queries and could only handle limited predefined questions, causing large volumes of unresolved queries to reach customer support, defeating the purpose of automation.
solution: Implemented multilingual chatbot powered by Gen AI for natural language processing
Integrated comprehensive knowledge base with user manuals, FAQs, and videos
Enabled audio query and response capabilities
Delivered video responses starting from relevant timestamps
Provided contextual understanding for complex queries

impact.queryResolution: 90% of queries resolved when answers available in knowledge base
impact.customerEngagement: Significantly increased through natural language interaction
impact.resolutionSpeed: Faster query resolution with precise answers and supporting artifacts

outcomes: 90% query resolution rate for knowledge base queries
Enhanced customer retention through engaging natural language interface
Improved customer satisfaction with instant, accurate responses
